headline: Integer Appoints Michael Coyle to Board of Directors
summary: ~ New Director Brings Extensive Medical Device Industry Leadership and Technology Experience to Integer Board ~ PLANO, Texas, July 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Integer Holdings Corporation (NYSE: ITGR), a leading global medical device contract development and manufacturing organization (CDMO), today announced it has appointed Michael Coyle to its Board of Directors. headline: VIVO Agency Names Jennifer Mugnaini as EVP of Client Services
summary: VIVO Agency, a strategic marketing partner for MedTech and healthcare brands, today announced the appointment of Jennifer Mugnaini as EVP of Client Services. Jen has over two decades of experience in healthcare marketing and client leadership, and will oversee VIVO's client service teams, shaping the agency's delivery model to meet the evolving needs of today's most ambitious health brands.
